name: Sheldon Wressell
descriptions: Garden Design School took me from having no experience of garden/landscape design, with few drawing, design, soft or hard-landscaping skills to a competent practitioner in less than a year. Twelve months on I run a busy  and successful Garden Design Company.

name: Hannah Rickards
descriptions: I looked forward to every day of the course and knew that I would miss it when we graduated! There is so much to learn and you can’t miss a second. The tutors are all very experienced and pass their knowledge on through fast paced and interesting lessons..

name: Christine Wilkie
descriptions: Moving into garden design has been a complete career change for me; I had no drawing or design experience but also had no idea how far I could come in a year. A steep learning curve doesn't even begin to describe it!.

name: Joanne Gilmartin,
descriptions: I’m so glad I took the plunge and enrolled on the Garden Design School Diploma – it’s been challenging and hard work, but immensely satisfying and rewarding. The course was incredibly comprehensive – even overwhelming at times – but with the tutors expertise, patience and encouragement I.

name: William Gray
descriptions: I found that the course delivered everything that was promised. The instruction was superb and I felt that the instructors were extremely knowledgeabl. Twelve months on I run a busy  and successful Garden Design Company.
